item.description:
Alright, it is time to act like a kid again! Throw on some kind of a costume and join us for dinner at 7:30 at Blaze on the East Side (located on Hope Street, not to be confused with the Blaze on Thayer Street). A reservation will be made, so RSVP as soon as you can even if you might be a little late.

Following dinner we will be going to the Factory of Terror!!! Check out the website and be sure to print off a coupon: http://www.factoryoft.... Mapquest any directions you may need in order to get from dinner to the haunted house, just in case we get separated. The address for the Factory of Terror is 33 Pearl Street, Fall River, MA 02721. Who knows what will be going on after the scary factory?!? If you want to meet up with us at any point, you can call my cell at 704.578.2659.

Costumes are STRONGLY encouraged, even if they're lame!
item.name: Halloween Fun!
